paragraph: Our mission is to support the strength of the Singularity Network students community by publishing real life facts and events, thereby promoting empathy and sympathy towards Beneficial BGI.
Our vision is creating an approachable publicity platform, to allow anyone to take part in the development of Decentralized Open-Source AGI.

Internationally, any voice is valuable and helps make an impact. The world is filled with fake news and biased propaganda, which leads to ignorance. Join us, help spread the word, every click and share count.
Click the Share button - which will copy the post and redirect you to a Facebook group.
